backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state, serving as a minimal backend placeholder.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: replacing shoe gallery images with men's branded footwear and updating product titles/descriptions to match the new images.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing the luxury shoe store website components, styling, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining luxury-themed design tokens for light and dark modes with gold accents.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference for the React application titled 'luxury shop'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing Hero, ShoeGallery, Reviews, and ContactInfo sections into a single-page luxury shoe store layout.
frontend/src/components/ContactInfo.tsx: Footer component with phone and WhatsApp contact buttons, copyright information, and caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section displaying Hari Traders logo, brand name with sparkle icons, and tagline with luxury styling and gold accents.
frontend/src/components/Reviews.tsx: Customer testimonials section displaying 4 reviews in a grid layout with profile images, names, 5-star ratings, and review text with luxury styling.
frontend/src/components/ShoeGallery.tsx: Gallery component showcasing 5 men's branded shoes (Adidas, Nike, Puma, Asian, Premium Casual) in a fixed 2-column grid with hover effects and luxury card styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing ICP backend actor creation with identity-based authentication, query caching, and automatic refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook providing Internet Identity authentication with login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Intentionally empty file as the backend has no methods and the website is static with no data fetching requirements.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom luxury-themed color palette (light/dark modes), OKLCH color space variables, and custom shadow utilities for gold accents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme with custom colors (luxury-gold, sidebar, chart), font families (Inter, Playfair Display), border radius variables, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project metadata for Hari Traders menswear e-commerce site tracking features for replacing shoe gallery images with men's branded footwear (Adidas, Nike, Puma, Asian) and updating product descriptions.
